title: White Short Sleeve Linen Blouse
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a women's white short sleeve blouse, made from lightweight linen, tailored fit, crew neckline, subtle tonal stitching, minimalistic design, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible seams and hems
